item.description:
Please RSVP now!

Swap #1: Four seasons (any or all)

Swap #2: Use gesso in some way on your cards

Activity: Zentangles (see www.zentangle.com for details). Julie and friends will share their knowledge of this addictive yet relaxing form of doodling and drawing.

We'll also pick up and swap out the cards for anyone participating in the Georgia ATC group's swap (see Message Board), distribute the final pages from the True Colors swap, work on real-time challenge cards and more.

AND...we'll have a special guest: Marie Z., owner of the former Stamp Act store, who will be selling lots of merchandise--rubber stamps and more. Bring your cash and checks (no credit cards).

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: November 2010 NE ATC+ Monthly Meetup in Natick
